sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.1.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.service-portal.service-status" name="Service Portal - Service Status" version="1.1.0" state="published" onload_demo_data="create_90_days_service_outages.js" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <description>Service Status will give end users information on current, planned, and historical outages for Business Services so they don't have to call your Service Desk. Loading demo data will randomly generate 90 days of outages for 19 demo data Business Services.</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.service-portal"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Service Status will give end users information on current, planned, and historical outages for Business Services so they don't have to call your Service Desk. Loading demo data will randomly generate 90 days of outages for 19 demo data Business Services.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.service-portal.service-status</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Service Portal - Service Status</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.service-portal.service-status/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.service-portal</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>de.service_portal.service_status</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.1.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
